item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:193 Chances: Comcast’s (CMCSA) fourth-quarter 2023 results are expected to reflect a steady performance of its Media and Theme Parks segments, as well as the Sky segment in Europe. The growing demand for high-speed internet and increased media consumption amid cord-cutting is benefiting cable television industry participants like CMCSA.
